channel.title: Furniture on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Furniture on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Wooden Street Logo
Wooden Street is an Indian online marketplace for furniture and home décor. The company was founded in 2015 and headquartered in Jaipur, Rajasthan.The companies turnover was Rs 2 crore in the first year, 2015-16, and it jumped to Rs 18 crore in 2016-17. In July 2018 the company secured seed capital of $1 million from Rajasthan Venture Capital Fund and $3 million in Series A funding led by IAN fund.
You can download theWooden Streetlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Wooden Street
item.description: Wooden Street is an Indian online marketplace for furniture and home décor. The company was founded in 2015 and headquartered in Jaipur, Rajasthan.The companies turnover was Rs 2 crore in the first year, 2015-16, and it jumped to Rs 18 crore in 2016-17. In July 2018 the company secured seed capital of $1 million from Rajasthan Venture Capital Fund and $3 million in Series A funding led by IAN fund.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Urban Ladder Logo Urban Ladder is an omnichannel furniture and decor retailer based out of Bangalore, India. Urban Ladder currently has 3 stores in Bangalore and distribution across 75+ cities in India through its website. Source
You can download theUrban Ladderlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Urban Ladder
item.description: Urban Ladder is an omnichannel furniture and decor retailer based out of Bangalore, India. Urban Ladder currently has 3 stores in Bangalore and distribution across 75+ cities in India through its website. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Harvey Norman Logo
Harvey Norman is a large Australian-based, multi-national retailer of furniture, bedding, computers, communications and consumer electrical products. It mainly operates as a franchise, with the main brand and all company-operated stores owned by ASX-listed Harvey Norman Holdings Limited. As of 2016, there are 280 company-owned and franchised stores in Australia, New Zealand, Europe and South-East Asia operating under the Harvey Norman, Domayne and Joyce Mayne brands in Australia, and under the Harvey Norman brand overseas.
You can download theHarvey Normanlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Harvey Norman
item.description: Harvey Norman is a large Australian-based, multi-national retailer of furniture, bedding, computers, communications and consumer electrical products. It mainly operates as a franchise, with the main brand and all company-operated stores owned by ASX-listed Harvey Norman Holdings Limited. As of 2016, there are 280 company-owned and franchised stores in Australia, New Zealand, Europe and South-East Asia operating under the Harvey Norman, Domayne and Joyce Mayne brands in Australia, and under the Harvey Norman brand overseas.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Aaron's, Inc. Logo The Aaron’s Company is a lease-to-own retailer. The company focuses on leases and retail sales of furniture, electronics, appliances, and computers. The company sells through the company-operated and franchised stores, e-commerce platform and national retail partners using virtual lease-to-own technology Progressive Leasing. Source
You can download theAaronslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.description: The Aaron’s Company is a lease-to-own retailer. The company focuses on leases and retail sales of furniture, electronics, appliances, and computers. Leroy-Merlin Logo
Leroy Merlin (French: [ləʁwa mɛʁlɛ̃]) is a French headquartered home improvement and gardening Retail serving several countries in Europe, Asia, South America, and Africa. Source
You can download theLeroy-Merlinlogo on full-version of the page.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
IKEA Logo
IKEA is a Swedish-founded multinational group that designs and sells ready-to-assemble furniture, kitchen appliances and home products, among other useful goods and occasionally home services. It has been the world’s largest furniture Retail since at least 2008. It was founded in Sweden in 1943 by 17-year-old carpenter Ingvar Kamprad, who was listed by Forbes in 2015 as one of the ten richest people in the world, worth more than $40 billion.
You can download theIKEAlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: IKEA
item.description: IKEA is a Swedish-founded multinational group that designs and sells ready-to-assemble furniture, kitchen appliances and home products, among other useful goods and occasionally home services. It has been the world’s largest furniture Retail since at least 2008. It was founded in Sweden in 1943 by 17-year-old carpenter Ingvar Kamprad, who was listed by Forbes in 2015 as one of the ten richest people in the world, worth more than $40 billion.
